dsutils.cpu



struct CPUTimes;
A struct that contains all the times you can find in a line of /proc/stat.

CPUTimes cpuTimes();
Returns:
the system-wide cpu times.

CPUTimes[] cpuTimesPerCpu();
The first cpuTime is for cpu0, the second for cpu1 etc ...

Returns:
a list of cpu_times

int nbCpu(bool logical = true);
Returns:
number of cpus

Params:
bool logical boolean to tell the function if you want to count the physicial or logicals cpus.
